altTitles.ja: ウスズミの果て

description.en: In a deserted post-apocalyptic metropolis riddled with a mysterious material a young girl is searching for any signs of life and supplies.
description.fr: Dans une métropole post-apocalyptique déserte criblée d'une matière mystérieuse, une jeune fille recherche tout signe de vie et des provisions.
description.tr: İnsanlığın yok olduğu bir dünyada dolaşan yalnız bir kız hakkında kıyamet sonrası bilimkurgu macerası.

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.ja: まるごとしんこんまぞく
ボンバーガール

description.en: Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.

During the era of space exploration, mankind is at war against monsters of unknown origin. The battle is grim, and the future looks bleak. Amidst the chaos, mankind plays their last hand. It's time for the Knights to step into the fray and turn the tide of this war.

Federal Informant ‘Baek Yisu’ and a criminal gang’s boss, ‘Baek Dogyeong’ are twin brothers.

With the same faces the two twin brothers have lived different lives until now. Yisu, who’s been betrayed by the gang, throws away his identity to become his brother. This federal agent is soon to become the gang’s boss…!
description.pt-br: Os irmãos gêmeos Baek Yisoo, agente de inteligência da Hid e Baek Dohyeong, chefe de uma organização criminosa, viveram vidas diferentes mesmo com o mesmo rosto. Depois de ser traído pela organização o irmão mais novo decide abandonar sua identidade e se tornar o irmão mais velho. Um agente de inteligência torna-se chefe de uma organização criminosa…!

altTitles.ja: 大ダーク

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

altTitles.ja: バウンサー

description.en: The manga centers on Jouichirou Shishido, a 19-year-old man whose frank honesty has cost him 26 part time jobs. One night, he runs into a group of muscular bodyguards who protect the streets at night, members of a private security firm known as "Tokyo Fist," which ends up changing his life.

altTitles.en: Wasteful Days of High School Girls

altTitles.ja: 女子高生の無駄づかい

description.en:
One day out of boredom, Tanaka decided to give her classmates nicknames based on their quirks. 
Her friend Kikuchi became “Ota” for her nerdy interests and her other friend Saginomiya became “Robo” 
because of her expressionless face. In retaliation, her friends decided to name Tanaka “Baka”. 
Enjoy the ridiculous days of three high school friends claiming the height (or not) of their youth.

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and it's neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"!
Feelings that couldn't be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

altTitles.ja: 夏目アラタの結婚

description.en: Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to "meet the criminal who killed his father". That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as the "Shinagawa Pierrot".
description.fr: “Le clown de Shinagawa” avait défrayé la chronique lors de son arrestation : cette tueuse en série corpulente, déguisée en clown, avait découpé et caché les corps de ses victimes… Pour aider l'enfant d'une victime à retrouver la tête de son père, Arata Natsume, assistant social, va la rencontrer. Mais contre toute attente, une frêle et fragile jeune fille arrive en face de lui. Est-elle vraiment un monstre sanguinaire ? Pour le savoir, Arata va devoir se livrer à un jeu dangereux en se prétendant amoureux d'elle…
description.pt: Natsume trabalha no conselho tutelar, está em seus trinta anos e solteiro, sem planos para casa. Mas um dia, ele recebe um pedido de uma criança a qual estava a cargo, de "encontrar o criminoso que matou seu pai". Tal assassino é a serial killer Shinagawa Shinu, também conhecida como "Pierrot Shinagawa".
description.es-la: Arata Natsume trabaja en un centro de orientación infantil, tiene más de treinta años y está soltero sin planes de matrimonio. Pero un día recibe una petición del niño que tenía a su cargo, Takuto, para "conocer al criminal que mató a su padre". Ese asesino en serie es Shinagawa Shinju, también conocido como el "Shinagawa Pierrot".

altTitles.ja: パラレルパラダイス

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?

altTitles.ja: 魔鬼

description.en:
"Devil, I don't want to marry him."

In hopes to escape a forced marriage, Giovinetta makes a wish to the devil to save her, but what she doesn't know are the consequences of her actions.

---
The lady trapped in the tower is being forced into a marriage. Her husband has killed or exiled his previous wives several times. The frightened princess eventually wakes up the sarcophagus in the basement and calls out the devil....

"I don't want to marry him, Raven."

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1165)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32223)
* Japanese / 日本語: [Comico](https://www.comico.jp/comic/8141), [Mecha Comics](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/141901)
description.ja:
塔に閉じ込められた公女に縁談の話が持ち上がる。彼女の旦那になる男は前妻を何人も殺したと言われる残虐な老人。恐ろしくなった公女は地下室の石棺を壊し悪魔を呼び出すのだが…「悪魔よ、わたくしはあの方と結婚したくありません」

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1165)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32223)
* Japanese / 日本語: [Comico](https://www.comico.jp/comic/8141), [Mecha Comics](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/141901)
description.zh:
贡女伊奈特与双胞胎弟弟约翰被母亲分离，从此伊奈特被关在了房里。直到成人，她也没有能再见到约翰。在她结婚的第一天晚上，丈夫不知缘由地被杀害。直到某天，她再次有了婚约，而即将成为她丈夫的男人，传闻是个残忍的老头，并杀死了他好几个前妻。因此害怕的她来到了地下室，打破了石棺，召来了魔鬼，希望能够阻止这场婚约。而就在她许下愿望的那天晚上，约翰的房间里却传出了奇怪的尖叫声……

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1165)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32223)
* Japanese / 日本語: [Comico](https://www.comico.jp/comic/8141), [Mecha Comics](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/141901)

altTitles.ja: 人形の国

description.en:
The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.  


---
description.pt:
O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem.  


---

**Officially published:**  
- In english by [Kodansha](https://kodanshacomics.com/series/aposimz/) (Print version by [Vertical](http://www.vertical-comics.com/books/aposimz_01.php))  
- In french by [Glénat](https://www.glenat.com/seinen/aposimz-la-planete-des-marionnettes-tome-01-9782344028827) as "Aposimz la planète des marionnettes"  
- In italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/notizie/articolo/aposimz/)  
- In german by [Manga Cult](https://www.cross-cult.de/titel/aposimz-land-der-puppen-1.html) as "Aposimz - Land der Puppen"  
  
**Note:** The oneshot was also translated by Kodansha: [Link](https://kodanshacomics.com/chapter/aposimz-prologue/)
description.pt-br: O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem…

title.en: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~

altTitles.en: The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Mysteries Journal
The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ru: Монолог в аптечной лавке - Журнал тайн внутреннего дворца Маомао

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the woman doctor/pharmacist from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young doctor/pharmacist will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

description.en: Once on the All Saints' Day vampire Beru and ghost Aki, despite their very different personalities, started living together in a castle. Multiple obstacles and difficulties already waiting on their way. But when they'll know each other better, eventually they'll become the most important companions for one another.

altTitles.ja: ファンタジスタ ステラ

description.en:
This is sequel of Fantasista Manga.   
Teppei and teammate Keisuke Honda aim for the FIFA World Cup 2014 in Brazil.

altTitles.en: Evolution in the Great Flood Era
The World Has Entered the Age of the Great Flood

description.en: The earth is suddenly surrounded by a tsunami of unknown origin and a powerful flood makes the mountains tremble in the waves as the ground groans… Su Yi wakes up to find the city flooded, corpses revived and beasts mutated… In the game of the gods, the hunt and Evolution begins.
description.zh: 地球突然被来历不明的海啸包围，强而有力的洪水，使高山在波涛中颤抖，陆地在巨变中呻吟……苏黎一觉醒来，发现城市被洪水淹没，尸体复活，野兽变异……在神明的游戏中，猎杀和进化开始了。

title.en: After I Save The Ice Princess From Another School From a Mol*ster, We Started as Friends

altTitles.ja: 他校の氷姫を痴漢から助けたら、お友達から始める事になりました

altTitles.en: After helping “Ice Princess” from another school, I decided to start as a friend

altTitles.ja: 戦闘員、派遣します！

description.en: The Secret Society Kisaragi has one mission: world domination! They claim to be an evil organization, but their scientist is eccentric, their hot female generals wear little clothing, and they’re surprisingly concerned about the fate of the world?! No. 6 is a Combatant for Kisaragi, meaning his body has been reconstructed to be stronger and obey the orders of the generals. His latest mission? To do recon on an unknown alien planet with his new partner, the deadpan android Alice. There, he meets a busty female knight… riding a unicorn?! Thus begins their hilarious invasion of a magical fantasy world!
description.es: La Sociedad Secreta Kisaragi tiene una misión: dominación mundial. Afirman que es una organización malvada, pero su científica es excéntrica, sus ardientes generales mujeres usan poca ropa y están sorprendentemente preocupados por el destino del mundo. No. 6 es un Combatiente para Kisaragi, lo que significa que su cuerpo ha sido reconstruido para ser más fuerte y obedecer las órdenes de los generales. ¿Su última misión? Hacer reconocimiento en un planeta alienígena desconocido con su nueva pareja, la inexpresiva androide Alicia. Allí, conocí a una caballero tetona…¡¿montando un unicornio?! ¡Así comienza su hilarante invasión de un mundo mágico de fantasía!
description.pt: Havia uma empresa chamada Kisaragi, uma sociedade secreta do mal que derruba um número de heróis no mundo e está prestes a conquistar o muno. Como não se sabe os desejos dessa associação, o combatente N° 6, o protagonista, será despachado para outros planetas com a android Alice. No entanto, este combatente mudou as configurações da android pare que ela não se comportasse como se fosse uma invasão, e sim u festival de Ochin, fazendo seus companheiros ficarem estúpidos. Além disso, quando chamaram novos companheiros, os novos membros que se uniram atraíram estandarismo, como a estupida quimera e o bispo. Enquanto isso, o mesmo vendedor que invoca o exército Magus começa a invadir a terra para destruí-la. A notícia se espalha nas ruas por atos de contravenção, e é transmitida ao herói que estava carregando a virtude do mal. “Não há organizações más no mundo” combatente N° 6 finalmente entra em ação com as heroínas metamorfose e as táticas de Kudzu, invadindo o novo mundo.
description.ru: Протагонистом является старший элитный боец корпорации зла именуемой как "Тайное сообщество Кисараги", которого вместе с девочкой андроидом отправили в другое измерение. И так они оказываются в мире меча и магии, где им предстоит создать предпосылки для захвата этого нового мира корпорацией зла Кисараги.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Hanabi wa Samenai Yume wo miru

altTitles.ja: 花火は醒めない夢をみる

description.en: Olivia, the daughter of a duke, is betrayed by her fiancé, Crown Prince Luke, and is publicly executed. However, the moment Olivia thinks she has lost her life, she wakes up as Hanabi, a high school girl in a different world: Japan. What's more, it seems that Hanabi is being bullied at school...? The story of a duke's daughter's rise to power is about to begin!
description.ja:
公爵令嬢が転生したらいじめられっ子JKだった件。
婚約者・ルークに裏切られ、公開処刑となったオリビア。…のはずが目が覚めるとそこは異世界で、女子高生・鏑木花火になっていた！ 花火は皆からいじめられていたようで、学校に行くとクラスから標的にされてしまう。しかもそこに現れたのは、ルークに瓜二つのクラスメイト・押野で…？

---
被身為未婚夫的路克皇太子背叛，而遭到公開行刑的公爵千金‧奧莉維亞。其徬徨的靈魂，作為異世界的日本女高中生‧花火再次蘇醒。 除了花火會在學校被人霸凌這件事，如班上老大般的男子竟與路克極為相似…？遇見全新自己的異世界轉生×下克上的故事！
description.zh-hk: 被身為未婚夫的路克皇太子背叛，而遭到公開行刑的公爵千金‧奧莉維亞。其徬徨的靈魂，作為異世界的日本女高中生‧花火再次蘇醒。 除了花火會在學校被人霸凌這件事，如班上老大般的男子竟與路克極為相似…？遇見全新自己的異世界轉生×下克上的故事！

altTitles.ja: MFゴースト

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

title.en: Erosugi Cheat de Isekai Harem♪ Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: エロすぎチートで異世界ハーレム♪コミックアンソロジー

altTitles.en: Otherworldly Harem with Extremely Erotic Cheats Comic Anthology

description.en:
An erotic isekai anthology comic by various 
1. My Cute Seedstock-San by [Kaworu Watashiya](mangaka.https://mangadex.org/author/9e5885df-6e1c-496f-9cf9-22f649ba4696/watashiya-kaworu) 
2. I love both big and small ones by [Amamiya Mizuki](https://mangadex.org/author/a27cfcf4-4ee5-4893-8171-19022dc240ee/amamiya-mizuki) 
3. Heart racing ♡ Maternal Instinct Blossom Harem by [Meisuke](https://mangadex.org/author/a6ace81e-ab56-4023-91f3-8db574f0f54b/meisuke) 
4. Goddess and Hero by [Mamo Williams](https://mangadex.org/author/6cf47ca2-2810-4c18-8852-eac4f44579b4/mamo-williams) 
5. Parallel World Cooking Paradise by [Guts Shihan](https://mangadex.org/author/3c238a89-9576-425c-8203-f769f65b59c2/guts-shihan)
6. Be Careful During the Mating Season! by [Omori Gohan](https://mangadex.org/author/a7a89851-905d-4806-9206-5ab1e6214e44/omori-gohan)
7. I Became a Slime in Another World, So I Decided to Try a Slippery Massage by [Makoto Ohara](https://mangadex.org/author/25b4fab2-3a80-46b0-87da-c321a99fd74c/ohara-makoto)
8. The Extra Guy Becomes the Main Character of a Harem in Another World by [Amemori](ttps://mangadex.org/author/9bf404a3-6caf-47fd-b10a-b48f0b636712/amemori)
description.ja:
スキル覚醒→推しの娘みんなと即ハーレム11名の豪華執筆陣が彩る、理想の異世界へG O！

異世界ヒロイン全員オレのもの！　覚醒チートでエッチなハーレム結成！　姫騎士・エルフ・魔王様・サキュバス５姉妹・聖女・ドワーフ・単眼・ロリ魔法使い・天使・ホムンクルス・令嬢・ハーピー・眼鏡・くの一・獣人・爆乳お姉さんパーティー――あなたの推しヒロイン、みんなとイチャイチャできちゃうハーレムアンソロジー！！！

description.en:
An ordinary corporate slave, Ding Xueyang, has a secret - he has a special ability! But his special ability has a flaw; if he is seen using it, the special ability will be randomized to a new one.

For over twenty years, in order to keep this secret, Ding Xueyang has been living very cautiously. He didn't have a significant other, didn't make any friends, and didn't even keep a pet.

Until one day, a homeless person came across his secret, and from then on Ding Xueyang has plunged into an abyss of suffering!

altTitles.en: Apotheosis – Elevation to the Status of a God
Principles of Heavens - Zen’s Cultivation of Immortality

description.en: Luo Zheng, now a humble slave was born as the eldest son of a wealthy family. Due to his family's decline, the kidnapping of his sister by a powerful force, he can now only be stepped upon by others. However, heaven never seals off all exits. An ancient book left by his father reveals a secret divine technique, giving the reader immense power! But what is behind this power? This is a contest against fate.
description.fr:
Luo Zheng est un esclave qui était auparavant fils ainé d’une famille riche. En raison du déclin de sa famille et de l’enlèvement de sa sœur par une force puissante, il est désormais piétiné et humilié par les autres. Cependant, le paradis ne scelle jamais toutes les sorties. Un livre ancien laissé par son père révèle une technique divine secrète, donnant au lecteur un immense pouvoir ! Mais que cache ce pouvoir ? Une course contre le destin débute !  
  


---

Official English Alternative:  
<https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/119>
description.it: Luo Zheng, ora un umile schiavo, è nato come il figlio maggiore di una famiglia ricca. A causa del declino della sua famiglia, del rapimento di sua sorella da parte di una forza potente, ora può essere calpestato solo da altri. Tuttavia, il paradiso non chiude mai tutte le uscite. Un libro antico lasciato da suo padre rivela una tecnica divina segreta, dando al lettore un potere immenso! Ma cosa c'è dietro questo potere? Questa è una gara contro il destino.

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: Doutei Yuusha no Harem Maou Toubatsuki

altTitles.ja: 童貞勇者のハーレム魔王討伐記

altTitles.ja-ro: Doutei Yuusha no Harem Maoh Toubatsuki

altTitles.en: The Tale of the Virgin Hero's Harem and the Demon Lord's Subjugation.

description.en:
For the Subjugation of the Demon Lord, the hero Alvin was invited by the king. The first to join his party was the elven priestess, Rishel. As soon as they met, she invited him to the inn before the other companions joined... It seems there's another purpose besides defeating the Demon Lord!?

To the somewhat shy and virgin hero... the priestess(elven girl), the warrior (beast girl), and the assassin(tan-skinned girl) are all coming on to him with their charms ♥

The otherworldly romantic comedy where everything is at stake, begins!!"

title.en: Watakushi no Koto ga Daikirai na Gitei ga Goei Kishi ni narimashita

altTitles.ja: わたくしのことが大嫌いな義弟が護衛騎士になりました

altTitles.en: My Foster Brother, Who Hates Me, Has Become a Guard Knight

description.en: A duke's daughter, Willemina, was harsh with her foster brother, Nigel, whom she suddenly had, thinking he was her father's 'illegitimate son.' She gradually comes to accept her foster brother, but cannot apologise for it for several years. She is not able to apologise, and after a few years, her foster brother becomes a knight-at-arms, but things are not what they seem.

altTitles.zh-ro: Tā De Shān, Tā De Hǎi

description.en: (Gentle, tenacious honor student and the cold domineering girl) Chi Tang and Youyu are both weirdos in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They become desk mates, roommates, each other's salvation, protecting the other's warmth. The relationship between the two went from ignorance to understanding. A poem of youth composed.
description.zh: （温柔坚韧学霸&骄横高冷少女）池唐和游余都是高一二班被敬而远之的异类，她们成为同桌和室友，也成为救赎、保护彼此的温暖。两人的感情从懵懂到刻骨，谱写一首青春的诗歌。

description.en: One day, a devil appears to a student and proposes a game. She tempts him with one wish if he wins. But if he loses, she takes his soul. He begins a dangerous game with the dreaming devil in his desperation to save his sleeping sister.

title.en: Danshi Kinsei Majo no Kuni ni Nyotaika Skill de Nyuukoku shite mita

altTitles.ja: 男子禁制魔女の国に女体化スキルで入国してみた

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Kinsei Majo no Kuni ni Nyotaika Skill de Nyuukoku shite mita

altTitles.en: Using Feminization Skills to Enter The Land of Witches, Where Men are Forbidden

altTitles.zh: 试着使用女体化技能进入禁止男人的魔女国度

description.en: "I sneaked into the witch's land, where men are forbidden, using feminization magic!" A guy gets hit by a truck after saving a girl, and gets sent into another world. Unlike other protagonists who get insane cheat skills, he gets a skill that allows him to transform into a girl instead.
description.ja: 「絶対にバレてはいけない。僕が“男”だということを……」　魔女の国。そこは絶対男子禁制の女性だけが入国を許される花園。男子が王都に立ち入れば、即極刑！　そんな王都にある、魔女学園の門を叩く者がいた。名はトワ・ミツミネ。異世界転生してきた男子高校生である。もちろん男のトワには王都に入ることはできないはずだった。しかし、トワは異世界転生時にとあるスキルを手に入れた。それは、“普通の”最強スキルではなく――女の子に変身できる“女体化”スキルだった。しかも女体化状態なら超強力な魔法も使えるようで……！　元男子高校生には刺激的過ぎる女の子しかいない学園生活！　憧れの『最強魔女騎士』めざし、トワのちょっとえっちな女体化ファンタジーライフが始まる！

description.en:
In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.ja: 婦警さんと暗殺さん

description.en:
The assassin with a scary mug has arrived in the town where the (air-headed) policewoman with a strong sense of justice lives! 
Although his target is a businessman, his constant flirting with the policewoman is causing him great trouble! 
The assassin constantly tries to stop the businessman who is in love with the policewoman… 
and if you look closely, there's a possible love triangle?! 
Will the day the assassin can complete his job come?! 
Keep an eye on this fantastic love comedy.

altTitles.ja: 銀のくつ

description.en: This is the story of Jun, a (nearly) six-year-old boy. Life from the point of view of a little rascal with two loving dads and a pair of adorable friends.

altTitles.ja: くま クマ 熊 ベアー

description.en: Yuna, a 15-year-old girl, started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today, a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore, when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game, she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat, if she takes it off she's a normal girl. Her adventure starts just like that. Yuna began doing whatever she wanted.
description.ru:
Пятнадцатилетняя девочка Юна уже три года ведет жизнь хиккикомори. Друзей, школу и даже родителей ей заменяют Интернет и онлайн-игры. Год назад она начала играть в игру «Fantasy World Online» — RPG с виртуальной реальностью. Она заработала миллиарды и с помощью денег избавилась от присутствия родителей.  
  
И вот, вышло новое глобальное обновление. Как игрок с большим стажем, она по акции получила уникальный костюм. Затем прошла опрос и вместо игры оказалась в глухом лесу. Письмо от Бога? Другой мир? Что за бред?  
  
В своем новом костюме она читер. Без него обычная девочка. Так началось ее приключение, в котором она решила делать то, что ей захочется.

altTitles.ja: 村井の恋

description.en:
Murai, a high school boy who is acting strangely, confesses his feelings to Tanaka-sensei, an Otome game geek, but is kicked out. The next day, Murai, who has a new haircut, looks a lot like Tanaka's "favorite character"...?!

---
Placed 2nd in the webcomic section of the 2019 Tsugimanga awards.

title.en: The Story of a Scary Consignee

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

title.en: Imokusa Reijou desu ga Akuyaku Reisoku wo Tasuketara Kiniiraremashita

altTitles.ja: 芋くさ令嬢ですが悪役令息を助けたら気に入られました

altTitles.en: I'm an Unfashionable Lady, but When I Helped a Villainous Young Lord He Ended up Liking Me
I'm an Uncouth Lady, but I Helped the Villainous Young Lord but He Ended up Liking Me

description.en:
Agnes, who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble, happened to help Nazelbert, the duke's son, who had been betrothed to the Princess. However, the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look, he seems to hate it too. Wait, he doesn't?

This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son, who grow closer to each other.

---
* [Orignal Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2047go/)
description.ja: 伝統に執着する家柄のせいで古臭い格好を義務付けられ、「芋くさ令嬢」と馬鹿にされていたアニエス。あるパーティー中、王女殿下から婚約破棄された公爵の息子ナゼルを助けたことで、彼との結婚を命じられる！　しかし、命令で結婚したはずの二人は、本物の恋に落ちていき!?

title.en: Loop kara Nukedasenai Akuyaku Reijou wa, Akiramete Suki Katte Ikiru Koto ni Kimemashita

altTitles.ja: ループから抜け出せない悪役令嬢は、諦めて好き勝手生きることに決めました

altTitles.en: The Villainess, Stuck in a Loop, Decides to Give Up and Live as She Pleases!
The Villainess That Can’t Get Out of the Loop, Decides to Do Whatever She Wants With Her Life

description.en: Selene Vixent has died nine times. In every life, she's been betrayed by her fiancé, abused by her noble family, and laid low by an untimely end all because she was unable to awaken the power of Sun, a so-called protective gift passed down in her family. Yet Selene is determined to escape this cursed time loop and, after her ninth demise, abandons any further attempts to be a good girl. She awakens to the power of Shadow—seen as an ominous portent of misfortune—and fully embraces her new life as a villainess. But Selene's dark path is about to take another strange turn when Dier Veldt, the former crown prince, reveals that he knows all about her time loop. He even offers his help, but under one condition: she must kill him in exchange. With her newfound villainy, can Selene break free of this endless time loop once and for all?

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en: Anthology horror series detailing the "Round of 100 Ghost Stories", an old folktale believed to originate from Japan retold through the lens of Yuuma, a boy who lives in a troubled household. Often used as a test of courage where participants tell one hundred supernatural stories and blow out one candle then look at themselves in the mirror after they finish each story. When the one-hundredth candle is blown out, it is said that ghosts and demons are summoned to our world.
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

Mitsuki had always dream of breaking out of her shell and finding true friends as she enters high school. However, she suddenly encounters a group of four good-looking guys from the basketball team, guiding her life into an unexpected direction…?  
  
**Note:** Vol. 14 contains 2 "half-time collection" chapters and 3 "extra period" chapters. The last chapter (56) is in 13th volume in original Japanese edition. If your last chapter's vol number cannot match, you cannot get "end" tag next to chapter on MD. Please stop changing the info and confusing the readers.

altTitles.ja: ミクガキ
リコリス・リコイル

description.en: Takina Inoue, a high school girl working as a member of an all-female taskforce of assassins and spies known as "Lycoris" dispatched to eliminate criminals and terrorists in Tokyo, is sanctioned by her superiors at the DA agency for disobeying orders in order to save a colleague. She is transferred to work with the elite Lycoris agent Chisato Nishikigi at one of the agency's branches, which operates under the cover of a cafe, called "LycoReco".
description.ja: 凶悪犯罪が一切起こらない国・日本。その治安を陰から維持するエージェント「リコリス」の正体は、制服に身を包み、都市に紛れる少女たちであった――。

altTitles.ja: ぼくらの夏が裂けていく

description.en: A teenage boy returns to his remote home island from the mainland. While people stopped wearing masks there, on the island the rules to wear masks outside at all times are still surprisingly strict. Could the reason be something different than corona?

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。
